title: Johnson's Baby Oil, Mineral Oil Enriched with Shea & Cocoa Butter to Prevent Moisture Loss, Hypoallergenic, 20 fl. oz
description: Soothe and moisturize baby soft skin to help protect it from dryness using Johnson's baby oil enriched with shea & cocoa butter. The pure mineral baby oil, enriched with shea and cocoa butter, locks in up to 10 times more moisture *on wet skin than an ordinary lotion can on dry skin. To use, gently massage baby oil onto damp skin after bathing to leave skin feeling baby soft. Works best on damp, not dry skin.
